workflowEditorDescription: Design conversation flows for chatbots with drag & drop
clickToEdit: Specific controls will be shown based on the selected node type.
editNodeDescription: Modify the properties of the selected node
messageSettingsDescription: Configure additional options for this message node
aiPromptDescription: Use {{variables}} to customize the prompt with context data
aiModelSettingsDescription: Configure the AI model and parameters like temperature
conditionExpressionDescription: Write a logical expression that evaluates to true or false
conditionBranchesDescription: Configure the flow for the 'true' and 'false' cases
actionDefinitionDescription: Define what action should be performed (API, update variables, etc.)
actionSettingsDescription: Configure additional options for this action node
menuItemsDescription: Add options for the user to select from
menuItemsConnectionsDescription: Each menu option has its own connection point on the right side
multimediaTypeDescription: Choose the type of multimedia content to display
multimediaDescription: Create rich multimedia messages with images, videos, or product cards
nodeCopyCreated: A copy of the node has been created
nodeRemoved: The node has been removed from the flow
workflowSavedSuccess: The workflow has been saved successfully
messageDescription: Send a message to the user
conditionDescription: Branch the flow based on conditions
menuDescription: Present a menu of options to the user
webChannelDescription: Configure settings for the web chat widget
